info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 11:23AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Cabarrus, southern Mecklenburg, western Union, Chester and southeastern York Counties through NOON EST... At 1123 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Uptown Charlotte to 9 miles southwest of Chester. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rock Hill, Uptown Charlotte, Monroe, Chester, Central Charlotte, South Charlotte, Southwest Charlotte, East Charlotte, Matthews and Mint Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
